title: Bug 49195: Error message is printed when using shutdown port 1 with Tomcat service on Windows
description: When specifying <Server port="1" in server.xml, an error message is printed when stopping the Tomcat service. It is worth noting that this issue may also occur when using jsvc. There could be improvements in how Tomcat is stopped, as currently System.exit(0) is used regardless of the shutdown port configuration.
OB: Install Tomcat as a service on Windows. Start the service, and then stop the service.
EB: Start the Tomcat service, and then stop it through an OS signal, such as by calling Catalina.stop().
SR: Shut down the Tomcat server by sending an OS signal, for example, by calling Catalina.stop().
